text: Teasley is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Brian Teasley, American musician *Jerome Teasley (1948–2016), American soul drummer *Lisa Teasley (born 1964), American writer and artist *Nikki Teasley (born 1979), American basketball player *Sam Teasley (born 1976), American politician Category:English-language surnames Category:Surnames of British Isles origin
title: Teasley
